meanings.definition: A synthetic polymer made from styrene monomers.
meanings.sent1: The factory produces polystyrenes for packaging materials.
meanings.sent2: I recycled the polystyrenes from the packaging of my new TV.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the polystyrenes, mistaking them for toys.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like polystyrenes, strong and flexible in design.
meanings.sent5: The polystyrenes floated effortlessly on the water, showing their buoyancy.

meanings.sent1: The shelves were filled with various polystyrenes for different uses.
meanings.sent2: I disposed of the old polystyrenes properly to help the environment.
meanings.sent3: The kids built a fort out of the polystyrenes, pretending it was a castle.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was dotted with polystyrenes, resembling miniature buildings.
meanings.sent5: The artist molded the polystyrenes into intricate sculptures, showcasing creativity.
